headline.print_headline: Barry Diller-Backed Aereo Raises Additional $34 Million
headline.main: Barry Diller-Backed Aereo Raises Additional $34 Million

docs.snippet: Aereo Inc, the Barry Diller-backed online television venture that is facing a legal battle from four major broadcasters said it had raised $34 million from its new round of financing....
docs.lead_paragraph: Aereo Inc, the Barry Diller-backed online television venture that is facing a legal battle from four major broadcasters said it had raised $34 million from its new round of financing.

headline.print_headline: Hood Scores 27, No. 16 Duke Beats Ga Tech 79-57
headline.main: Hood Scores 27, No. 16 Duke Beats Ga Tech 79-57

docs.snippet: Rodney Hood scored 15 of his 27 points in the second half, and No. 16 Duke beat Georgia Tech 79-57 on Tuesday night....
docs.lead_paragraph: Rodney Hood scored 15 of his 27 points in the second half, and No. 16 Duke beat Georgia Tech 79-57 on Tuesday night.

docs.snippet: Breanna Stewart scored 24 points, grabbed nine rebounds and blocked six shots to lead top-ranked UConn to a 90-40 rout of Houston in the first meeting between the two programs....
docs.lead_paragraph: Breanna Stewart scored 24 points, grabbed nine rebounds and blocked six shots to lead top-ranked UConn to a 90-40 rout of Houston in the first meeting between the two programs.

headline.print_headline: Goldman Fund Sells Stake in Port Operator SSA Marine
headline.main: Goldman Fund Sells Stake in Port Operator SSA Marine

docs.snippet: An infrastructure fund run by Goldman Sachs has sold its 49 percent stake in the holding company of SSA Marine, one of the world's largest privately held port operators, SSA said on Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: An infrastructure fund run by Goldman Sachs has sold its 49 percent stake in the holding company of SSA Marine, one of the world's largest privately held port operators, SSA said on Tuesday.

docs.snippet: Franky, an easygoing 17-year-old tortoise, sauntered down an aisle of Lou's Pet Shop in Grosse Pointe, Mich., while broadcasting his movements online via Dropcam....
docs.lead_paragraph: Franky, an easygoing 17-year-old tortoise, sauntered down an aisle of Lou's Pet Shop in Grosse Pointe, Mich., while broadcasting his movements online via Dropcam.

headline.main: Ford Chief Out of Running to Lead Microsoft

docs.snippet: Comments by Alan Mulally, the chief of Ford, are the most definitive sign yet that he is out of the running for the Microsoft job, though the prospects of such a change had dimmed in recent weeks....
docs.abstract: Comments by Alan Mulally, the chief of Ford, are the most definitive sign yet that he is out of the running for the Microsoft job, though the prospects of such a change had dimmed in recent weeks.

headline.print_headline: Calif. Deputy Waited Seconds Before Shooting Boy With Toy Rifle: Lawsuit
headline.main: Calif. Deputy Waited Seconds Before Shooting Boy With Toy Rifle: Lawsuit

docs.snippet: A northern California sheriff's deputy shot a 13-year-old just three seconds after ordering him to drop a plastic replica of an assault rifle, the boy's parents claimed in an amended civil rights lawsuit filed Tuesday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A northern California sheriff's deputy shot a 13-year-old just three seconds after ordering him to drop a plastic replica of an assault rifle, the boy's parents claimed in an amended civil rights lawsuit filed Tuesday.

headline.print_headline: Ray Allen Mulling 'He Got Game' Sequel
headline.main: Ray Allen Mulling 'He Got Game' Sequel

docs.snippet: Jesus Shuttlesworth returns to the court this week. Jesus Shuttlesworth may return to the big screen in the future....

headline.print_headline: China to Let Foreign Telcos Offer Some Services From Shanghai Zone
headline.main: China to Let Foreign Telcos Offer Some Services From Shanghai Zone

docs.snippet: China will allow foreign investment in seven telecoms value-added services in the Shanghai Free Trade Zone, with full foreign ownership permitted in five of the services, the official Xinhua news agency reported....
docs.lead_paragraph: China will allow foreign investment in seven telecoms value-added services in the Shanghai Free Trade Zone, with full foreign ownership permitted in five of the services, the official Xinhua news agency reported.

headline.print_headline: Judge Denies Ex-US Rep. Rick Renzi's Bail Request
headline.main: Judge Denies Ex-US Rep. Rick Renzi's Bail Request

docs.snippet: A federal judge has refused to allow ex-U.S. Rep. Rick Renzi remain free on bail while he appeals his convictions on public corruption and money laundering charges....
docs.lead_paragraph: A federal judge has refused to allow ex-U.S. Rep. Rick Renzi remain free on bail while he appeals his convictions on public corruption and money laundering charges.
